page.title: 17RELIGION IN GILLINGHAM
page.content: There are 4 churches in Gillingham St Marys, the C of E Parish Church, St Benedicts Roman Catholic, the Methodist and Baptist churches. An average number of 500 attend each Sunday - 10% of the population. The churches are well used for Baptisms, Marriages and Funerals Figures for 1984-85 BAPTISMS MARRIAGES FUNERALS C OF E 34 15 41 R.C. 2 2 4 METH. 2 4 8 BAP. N/A 1 8 Attendance at all churches is rising. St Marys dates from the 13th century most being 19th, the R.C. 1907, the Methodist 1838,Baptist 1892. Rev. J. McNeish, C of E, Rev. C. Smith R.C., Rev. B. Skutt, Methodist, Rev. I. Malyon, Baptist.
